import React from 'react' import { useTranslation } from 'lib/../i18n' import GiftIcon from 'assets/images/icon-gift@2x.png' export const Erc20AwardsTable = (props) => { const { t } = useTranslation() const { pool } = props const externalErc20Awards = pool?.externalErc20Awards const externalErc721Awards = pool?.externalErc721Awards return <>
{t('lootBox')}
{t('itemPrizes')}
}
